cyclone.name: MARCO
cyclone.current_location: about 155 miles ESE of Cabo Gracias a Dios on the Nicaragua/Honduras border
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest and forecast to curve northwest across the Yucatán Peninsula and then toward the north-central Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Louisiana coast (near Plaquemines Parish) early Tuesday

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Yucatán Peninsula, western Gulf coastal Mexico, and northern Gulf Coast from Texas to Louisiana
weather_observation.wind: Low (3%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; any winds likely to remain below 39 mph if storm follows forecast
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Plaquemines Port District in current advisory
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate rainfall possible; totals currently projected below 4 inches
